STEPS.description: Prepare ASIF raw data by removing unconsistent year format, industry and birth year
STEPS.query:
CREATE TABLE firms_survey.asif_firms_prepared WITH (format = 'PARQUET') AS
WITH own AS(
SELECT *,
array_max(
    ARRAY[e_state, e_collective, e_legal_person, e_individual, e_hmt, e_foreign]
    ) AS max_array_equity,
map_keys(
  map_filter(
  map(
  ARRAY[1,2,3,4,5, 6],
  ARRAY[e_state, e_collective, e_legal_person, e_individual, e_hmt, e_foreign]
  ),
  (k, v) -> v = array_max(
  ARRAY[e_state, e_collective, e_legal_person, e_individual, e_hmt, e_foreign]
  )
  )
  ) AS max_key_array_equity
FROM "firms_survey"."asif_unzip_data_csv"
WHERE 
 (
  year in ('1998', '1999', '2000', '2001', '2002', '2003', '2004', '2005', '2006', '2007')
  )
  AND 
  (
  LENGTH(citycode) = 4
  AND 
  LENGTH(setup) = 4
  AND 
  LENGTH(cic) <= 4
  AND 
  regexp_like(firm, '\d+') = TRUE
    )
    )
     SELECT 
     
     firm, year, export, dq, name, town, village, street, c15, zip, product1_, c26, c27, cic, type, c44, c45, setup, c47, c60, c61, employ, c69, output, new_product, c74, addval, cuasset, c80, c81, c82, c83, c84, c85, tofixed, c87, todepre, cudepre, netfixed, c91, c92, toasset, c95, c97, c98, c99, captal, e_state, e_collective, e_legal_person, e_individual, e_hmt, e_foreign, sales, c108, c113, c110, c111, c114, c115, c116, c118, c124, c125, profit, c128, c131, c132, c133, c134, c136, wage, c140, c141, c142, c143, c144, c145, midput, c62, c147, c64, c65, c93, c16, c9, c10, c11, c17, c29, c167, c168, v90, c79, c96, c117, c119, c121, trainfee,c123, c127, c135, c120, c138, c148, c149, c150, c151, rdfee, c156, c157, citycode, prov, ownership 
     
     FROM (
       SELECT
     *,
  CASE 
  WHEN type in ('159','160') AND max_key_array_equity = ARRAY[1] THEN 'COLLECTIVE'
  WHEN type in ('159','160') AND max_key_array_equity = ARRAY[2] THEN 'SOE'
  WHEN type in ('159','160') AND max_key_array_equity = ARRAY[3] THEN 'PRIVATE'
  WHEN type in ('159','160') AND max_key_array_equity = ARRAY[4] THEN 'PRIVATE'
  WHEN type in ('159','160') AND max_key_array_equity = ARRAY[5] THEN 'HTM'
  WHEN type in ('159','160') AND max_key_array_equity = ARRAY[6] THEN 'FOREIGN'
  WHEN type in ('110','141','143','151') THEN 'SOE' 
  WHEN type in ('120','130','142','149') THEN 'COLLECTIVE' 
  WHEN type in ('171','172','173','174','190') THEN 'PRIVATE' 
  WHEN type in ('210','220','230','240') THEN 'FOREIGN' 
  WHEN type in ( '310','320','330','340') THEN 'HTM'
  END AS ownership
       FROM own
  
       )
       WHERE ownership in ('COLLECTIVE', 'SOE', 'PRIVATE', 'HTM', 'FOREIGN')

STEPS.description: Compute the financial ratio by city industry year, city industry and industry
STEPS.query:
SELECT len, COUNT(len) as CNT
FROM (
SELECT length(indu_2) AS len
FROM firms_survey.asif_city_industry_financial_ratio 
)
GROUP BY len
ORDER BY CNT

schema.Name: indu_2
schema.Comment: Two digits industry. If length cic equals to 3, then add 0 to indu_2

schema.Name: working_capital_cit
schema.Comment: Inventory [存货 (c81)] + Accounts receivable [应收帐款 (c80)] - Accounts payable [应付帐款  (c96)] city industry year

schema.Name: working_capital_ci
schema.Comment: Inventory [存货 (c81)] + Accounts receivable [应收帐款 (c80)] - Accounts payable [应付帐款  (c96)] city industry

schema.Name: working_capital_i
schema.Comment: Inventory [存货 (c81)] + Accounts receivable [应收帐款 (c80)] - Accounts payable [应付帐款  (c96)] industry

schema.Name: asset_tangibility_cit
schema.Comment: Total fixed assets [固定资产合计 (c85)] - Intangible assets [无形资产 (c91)] city industry year

schema.Name: asset_tangibility_ci
schema.Comment: Total fixed assets [固定资产合计 (c85)] - Intangible assets [无形资产 (c91)] city industry

schema.Name: asset_tangibility_i
schema.Comment: Total fixed assets [固定资产合计 (c85)] - Intangible assets [无形资产 (c91)] industry

schema.Name: current_ratio_cit
schema.Comment: Current asset [cuasset] / Current liabilities [c95]  city industry year

schema.Name: current_ratio_ci
schema.Comment: Current asset [cuasset] / Current liabilities [c95] city industry

schema.Name: cash_assets_cit
schema.Comment: Cash [( 其中：短期投资 (c79) + 应收帐款 (c80) + 存货 (c81)) - cuasset)] /  Assets [其中：短期投资 (c79) + 应收帐款 (c80) + 存货 (c81)]  city industry year

schema.Name: cash_assets_ci
schema.Comment: Cash [( 其中：短期投资 (c79) + 应收帐款 (c80) + 存货 (c81)) - cuasset)] /  Assets [其中：短期投资 (c79) + 应收帐款 (c80) + 存货 (c81)] city industry

schema.Name: cash_assets_i
schema.Comment: Cash [( 其中：短期投资 (c79) + 应收帐款 (c80) + 存货 (c81)) - cuasset)] /  Assets [其中：短期投资 (c79) + 应收帐款 (c80) + 存货 (c81)] industry

schema.Name: liabilities_assets_cit
schema.Comment: Liabilities [(流动负债合计 (c95) + 长期负债合计 (c97))] /  Total assets [资产总计318 (c93)]  city industry year

schema.Name: liabilities_assets_ci
schema.Comment: Liabilities [(流动负债合计 (c95) + 长期负债合计 (c97))] /  Total assets [资产总计318 (c93)] city industry

schema.Name: liabilities_assets_i

schema.Name: return_on_asset_cit
schema.Comment: Total annual revenue [全年营业收入合计 (c64) ] / (Delta Total assets 318 [$\Delta$ 资产总计318 (c98)]/2)  city industry year

schema.Name: return_on_asset_ci
schema.Comment: Total annual revenue [全年营业收入合计 (c64) ] / (Delta Total assets 318 [$\Delta$ 资产总计318 (c98)]/2) city industry

schema.Name: return_on_asset_i
schema.Comment: Total annual revenue [全年营业收入合计 (c64) ] / (Delta Total assets 318 [$\Delta$ 资产总计318 (c98)]/2) industry

schema.Name: sales_assets_cit
schema.Comment: (Total annual revenue - Income tax payable) [(全年营业收入合计 (c64) - 应交所得税 (c134))] / Total assets [资产总计318 (c98)]  city industry year

schema.Name: sales_assets_ci
schema.Comment: (Total annual revenue - Income tax payable) [(全年营业收入合计 (c64) - 应交所得税 (c134))] / Total assets [资产总计318 (c98)] city industry

schema.Name: sales_assets_i
schema.Comment: (Total annual revenue - Income tax payable) [(全年营业收入合计 (c64) - 应交所得税 (c134))] / Total assets [资产总计318 (c98)] industry

STEPS.description: Yearly Rank sectors based on SO2 emissionsand label them as ABOVE or BELOW
STEPS.query:
CREATE TABLE environment.china_sector_pollution_threshold WITH (format = 'PARQUET') AS
WITH agg_ind2 AS (
  SELECT 
    year, 
    ind2, 
    SUM(tso2) as tso2 
  FROM environment.china_city_sector_pollution 
  GROUP BY 
    year, 
    ind2
) 
SELECT 
  agg_ind2.year, 
  ind2, 
  tso2, 
  pct_75_tso2, 
  avg_tso2, 
  mdn_tso2,
  CASE WHEN tso2 > pct_75_tso2 THEN 'ABOVE' ELSE 'BELOW' END AS polluted_di,
  CASE WHEN tso2 > avg_tso2 THEN 'ABOVE' ELSE 'BELOW' END AS polluted_mi,
  CASE WHEN tso2 > mdn_tso2 THEN 'ABOVE' ELSE 'BELOW' END AS polluted_mei,
  CASE WHEN tso2 > 68070.78 THEN 'ABOVE' ELSE 'BELOW' END AS polluted_thre
FROM 
  agg_ind2 
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
      year, 
      approx_percentile(tso2,.75) AS pct_75_tso2, 
      AVG(tso2) AS avg_tso2, 
      approx_percentile(tso2,.50) AS mdn_tso2 
    FROM 
      agg_ind2 
    WHERE 
      tso2 > 0 
    GROUP BY 
      year 
    ORDER BY 
      year
  ) as threshold ON agg_ind2.year = threshold.year 
  ORDER BY year, ind2

schema.Name: polluted_di
schema.Comment: Sectors with values above Yearly 75th percentile of SO2 label as ABOVE else BELOW

schema.Name: polluted_mi
schema.Comment: Sectors with values above Yearly average of SO2 label as ABOVE else BELOW

schema.Name: polluted_mei
schema.Comment: Sectors with values above Yearly median of SO2 label as ABOVE else BELOW

schema.Name: polluted_thre
schema.Comment: Sectors with values above 68070.78  of SO2 label as ABOVE else BELOW

STEPS.description: Transform (creating time-break variables and fixed effect) asif_financial_ratio data and merging pollution, industry and city mandate tables
STEPS.query:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS employment_null
FROM fin_dep_pollution_baseline 
WHERE employment = 0

CATEGORICAL.PAIR: SELECT {2}, COUNT(*) AS nb_obs FROM {0}.{1} GROUP BY {2} ORDER BY nb_obs DESC
CATEGORICAL.MULTI_PAIR: SELECT {2}, {3}, COUNT(*) AS nb_obs FROM {0}.{1} GROUP BY {2}, {3} ORDER BY nb_obs DESC

DISTRIBUTION.bottom: WITH table_{3} AS ( SELECT MAP( ARRAY[0.25, 0.50, 0.75, 0.95, 0.99], approx_percentile( {2}, ARRAY[0.25, 0.50, 0.75, 0.95, 0.99] ) ) as nest FROM {0}.{1} ) SELECT pct, value AS {2} FROM table_{3} CROSS JOIN UNNEST(nest) AS t(pct, value)

ONE_PAIR_DISTRIBUTION.middle_2: ) as table_2_{0} ON table_wrapper.{1} = table_2_{0}.{1} AND table_wrapper.pct = table_2_{0}.pct
ONE_PAIR_DISTRIBUTION.bottom: WITH table_{3} AS ( SELECT {4}, MAP(ARRAY[0.25, 0.50, 0.75, 0.95, 0.99], approx_percentile( {2}, ARRAY[0.25, 0.50, 0.75, 0.95, 0.99] ) ) as nest FROM {0}.{1} GROUP BY {4}) SELECT {4}, pct, value AS {2} FROM table_{3} CROSS JOIN UNNEST(nest) AS t(pct, value)

CONTINUOUS.TWO_PAIRS_DISTRIBUTION: WITH dataset AS ( SELECT {2}, {3}, MAP( ARRAY[0.25, 0.50, 0.75, 0.95, 0.99], approx_percentile( {4}, ARRAY[0.25, 0.50, 0.75, 0.95, 0.99] ) ) as nest FROM {0}.{1} GROUP BY {2}, {3} ) SELECT {2}, {3}, pct, value AS {4} FROM dataset CROSS JOIN UNNEST(nest) AS t(pct, value)

COUNT_DUPLICATES.query: SELECT CNT, COUNT(*) AS CNT_DUPLICATE FROM ( SELECT {2}, COUNT(*) as CNT FROM {0}.{1} GROUP BY {2} ) GROUP BY CNT ORDER BY CNT_DUPLICATE
